user.title: Configure Energy Manager
user.description:
Select the sensors from your EcoFlow system.

The integration will automatically detect the matching control entities (charge power, feed-in power, PowerStream mode) from the same devices.

data_description.grid_power_sensor: Current grid import (+) / export (âˆ’) in watts. Usually from your smart meter or energy monitor.
data_description.solar_power_sensor: Current solar production in watts from your PowerStream or inverter.
data_description.battery_soc_sensor: Battery state of charge in percent (e.g. sensor.delta_2_max_battery_level).
data_description.charge_switch: Shelly relay that controls AC power to the battery charger. Turned on/off to start/stop charging.
data_description.discharge_switch: Shelly relay that controls AC output from the PowerStream. Turned on/off to start/stop feed-in.

data_description.feed_in_mode: Dynamic adjusts feed-in to match consumption. Static uses a fixed value.
data_description.feed_in_static_power: Fixed feed-in power when using static mode.
data_description.min_battery_soc: Stop discharging when battery reaches this SOC.
data_description.max_grid_feed_in_power: Maximum power to feed into the home.
data_description.grid_power_tolerance_discharge: Acceptable grid import while discharging. Higher = less grid import but less battery usage.
data_description.max_grid_import_solar_charge: Maximum grid import allowed during solar charging (0 = pure solar only).
data_description.min_charge_power: Minimum battery charging power (below this, charging is stopped).
data_description.update_interval: How often the manager evaluates and adjusts (seconds).
data_description.deadband: Power deviation threshold before adjusting (prevents oscillation).
data_description.charge_power_step: Step size for charge power adjustments per cycle (hardware constraint).
data_description.min_dwell_time: Minimum time to stay in a state before transitioning (seconds).
